duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform the functions of a Medical Assistant on a routine basis, including providing support to healthcare professionals and maintaining a safe environment for patient care.
Conduct clerical functions as needed, such as scheduling appointments, maintaining patient records, and facilitating the smooth operation of the clinic site.
Administer immunizations and other injections, as well as assisting with basic medical procedures under the supervision of healthcare providers.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or Certificate of General Educational Development (GED) or High School Equivalency Diploma (HSED) required.
Graduate of medical assistant program, preferred.
Certification or Registration (Clinical Certified Medical Assistant, Certified Medical Assistant or Registered Medical Assistant), preferred.
Experience in a primary care/specialty care pediatric ambulatory setting highly preferred.
BLS-Basic Life Support Healthcare Provider - American Heart Association
